situation: Three pipes A, B and C are connected in parallel. If the combined discharged of the 3 pipes is equal to 0.61 m<sup>3</sup>/s, and assuming they have equal values of friction factor "f", compute the following using the tabulated data shown:

subquestions.question: Compute the rate of flow of pipeline A in liters/sec.
Compute the rate of flow of pipeline B in liters/sec.
Compute the rate of flow of pipeline C in liters/sec.
